frame.name: Becoming
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> ends up in a <fen>Final_state</fen> or <fen>Final_category</fen> which it was not in before.
<ex><fex name="rea">Why</fex> <fex name="ent">I</fex> <t>became</t> <fex name="finc">an Emacs user</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="ent">I</fex> Left The Ministry And <t>Became</t> <fex name="finc">An Atheist</fex></ex>
<ex>Surprisingly, <fex name="ent">various veteran organizations</fex> also <t>turned</t> <fex name="fins">vehemently antiwar</fex>.</ex>
<ex> <fex name="trp">Over the years</fex> <fex name="ent">she</fex> <t>became</t> <fex name="finc">very much a part of the Sturtevant family</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Reason
FE.definition: <def-root>A state of affairs that an intentional <fen>Entity</fen> is responding to by changing.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>When the change occurs.
<ex><fex name="tim">By 1945</fex> he had <t>become</t> uncertain of the advisability of anyone having such a weapon.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration_of_final_state
FE.definition:
<def-root>For how long the <fen>Entity</fen> remains in the <fen>Final_state</fen> or <fen>Final_category</fen>.
<ex>He <t>became</t> <fex name="dur">for the next three years</fex> the prophetic voice of the Salvadoran people until his assassination on March 24, 1980</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (<ment>probably, presumably, mysteriously</ment>), secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In cases where the <fen>Entity</fen> is intentional, <fen>Manner</fen> may indicate salient characteristics of an intentional <fen>Entity</fen> that also affect the event (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>).
<ex>The majority <fex name="man">slowly</fex> <t>became</t> more and more disenchanted with him.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> which undergoes a change, ending up in the <fen>Final_state</fen> or <fen>Final_category</fen>.
<ex><fex name="ent">I</fex> <t>grow</t> impatient with your insolence.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Final_state
FE.definition:
<def-root>The state of the <fen>Entity</fen> after the event.
<ex>Everything 's <t>going</t> <fex name="fins">wrong</fex>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Final_category
FE.definition:
<def-root>The category that the <fen>Entity</fen> ends up in after the event.
<ex>He never could understand how she <t>ended</t> <t>up</t> <fex name="finc">an evangelist</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Transitional_period
FE.definition:
<def-root>The period during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in transition.
<ex><fex name="trp">Over the last 5 years</fex>, I've <t>become</t> sick and tired of your tomfoolery.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any eventuality or entity which brings about the change of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
<ex>Smithers <t>became</t> tired <fex name="cau">from all the work he'd been doing</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Initial_state
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the state of the <fen>Entity</fen> before becoming occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE marks the set of conditions under which the <fen>Entity</fen> enters the <fen>Final_state</fen> or <fen>Final_category</fen></def-root>

FE.name: Initial_category
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the category of the <fen>Entity</fen> before becoming occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for the occurance of the Becoming event. </def-root>

FE.name: Group
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual entities related to the <fen>Entity</fen> which are saliently affected by its change.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: get.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: come into a specified state

lexUnit.name: go.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: pass into or be in a specified state, especially an undesirable one:

lexUnit.name: end up.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: become (as the result of a process).

lexUnit.name: turn.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: change in nature, state, form, or color.
